Package it.polimi.ingsw.Le_Bestie.Model.Game

Class MatchState

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.Le_Bestie.Model.Game.MatchState
  • public class MatchState
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to describe the state of the current game. In few words, it represents the model outside. MatchState is the intermediate class between the controller and the model.
